title: 关于jolicraft。。
author: yiko0816
txt_content:
呃。。关于jolicraft的安装 我已经纠结了很久。。
请问把jolicraft的压缩文件放入 textpack之后 木有反应要怎么解决呢{:pig:}

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
到原版网页下载最新2.8版的Jolicraft试试看

网页:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/vi ... 76793&p=2554552

下载:
http://bit.ly/hOXGmo

Just download the zip and place it in your minecraft texture packs folder.

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content: 把 Jolicraft.zip 文件放到遊戲目錄 texturepacks 文件夾中，然後在主界面選項＂Mods and Texture Packs＂中選擇 Jolicraft 即可～～。

replies.author: yiko0816
replies.txt_content:
回复 well 的帖子

它木有显示的说

replies.author: hhyx
replies.txt_content: 压缩包里直接就是材质包吗 还是里面还有一个文件夹

replies.author: yiko0816
replies.txt_content:
回复 hhyx 的帖子

里面有个文件夹{:creeper:}

replies.author: hhyx
replies.txt_content: 新建一个zip 把那个文件夹里的东西放入

replies.author: yiko0816
replies.txt_content:
回复 hhyx 的帖子

它显示这样

replies.author: yiko0816
replies.txt_content:
回复 well 的帖子

谢谢。。终于弄好了~
